name: AssignedBillingOffer
comment: Represents the price plan details of the assigned products that are actually allocated to the customer or subscriber.
vf short description: Represents the price plan details of the assigned products that are actually allocated to the customer or subscriber.

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the assigned billing offer in ALDM. Each assigned billing offer key value represents a unique assigned billing offer, which is the billing offer assigned to a subscriber.

fields.name: MigratedToAssignedBillingOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MigratedFromAssignedBillingOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParentProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedMainComponentSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderActionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: StartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the beginning date of the period, in which the version is effective. For a version Ordered state, this field can be empty, or represents the due date of the order action according to specific application logic.

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date from which this assigned billing offer version is no longer effective. It is populated only when there is a more current version for that assigned billing offer, in which case this date is the START_DATE of the next version, or when the assigned billing offer is no longer active or ceased.

fields.name: OfferInstanceId
fields.comment: Identifies the current billing offer instance in the billing system.

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the record was created in the source system.

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the assigned billing offer in the source system.

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferVersionId
fields.comment: Indicates the version identifer of the assigned billing offer.

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainComponentSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CommitmentDuration
fields.comment: Number of months commited by the customer for using a price plan. This is relevant for basic price plans only.

fields.name: BusinessOfferTemplateBillingOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CommitmentStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date from which you must start calculating the commitment period. For example, provisioning date or  change ownership date.

fields.name: CrossProductRuleId
fields.comment: Specifies the cross product rule Id.

fields.name: ProvisioningDate
fields.comment: The date on which a product was provisioned.

fields.name: RequestExpiryDate
fields.comment: Indicates the Request Expiry Date.

fields.name: AssignedProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ItemActionTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the action type that caused this item to be added or removed.

fields.name: AssignedMainComponentId
fields.comment: Indicates the main component of this assigned billing offer.

fields.name: MigFromAssignedBillingOfferId
fields.comment: Indicates the previous assigned product identifier from where this subscriber has migrated.

fields.name: MigToAssignedBillingOfferId
fields.comment: Indicates the assigned product identifier where this subscriber has migrated.

fields.name: FrameworkAgreementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProposalSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ProductTemplateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSiteSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillEndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date billing should end on this product.

fields.name: BillStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date billing should commence on this product.

fields.name: BillingAccountNo
fields.comment: Account number associated with the charge.

fields.name: IsBillableFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if this record billable? (1 = no).

fields.name: IsPartOfComponentFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the product associated with a component? (1 = yes).

fields.name: AssignedProductConnectReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssignedProductDisconnectReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
